Reviews.Title: AWESOME LITTLE TV...
Reviews.Author: Rikjay
Reviews.Content: This little TV is great for a kitchen or as a small tv for a guest room or childs room. The remote is simple and concise. Setup is a breeze. Wall mounts easily. The picture is excellent. The viewing angle is excellent. I researched alot of 19" LCD TV's and decided on this one. Many other 19" tv's have a poor viewing angle...this one does not. The picture is clear. You will not go wrong with this TV. I have mine connected to a small radio shack Hi-DEF off-air antenna for the kitchen. I was amazed that I gets over 20 HD channels on it. The antenna is small and mounted outside. I would really compare this TV to Sony, Samsung. Its just as good. Not to mention the price..wow..it was about the same price as the bargain, off-brand TV"s. You wont go wrong with this little beauty! Youll see every pimple on American Idol! Whew hooh!!!!

Reviews.Title: OK...But Has It's Issues
Reviews.Author: Stanley M.
Reviews.Content: After having owned this TV for over a month I decided that an honest review was in order,First the Positives: This is an inexpensive LCD TV by a name manufacturer. It is lightweight, portable, attractive and easy to hook up. It has a wonderful picture provided that you are watching well lit indoor scenes or outdoor sporting events.The remote control has all of the functions necessary to set up picture and sound preferences and is much easier than using the small buttons located on the right side panel of the TV.Now for the Negatives: Most of the negatives can be overlooked as being relatively minor. Many have complained about the sound on this TV. It is not very good. It is rather tinny but keep in mind this is a small TV with not much space to put larger, better sounding speakers. You can adjust the bass and treble through the audio settings on the menu. This does help some. The solution to this problem is to just add external speakers through the audio out jack on the back of the TV or through audio output jacks on a cable box if you have one.LCD TV's unlike old picture tube tvs have to be viewed from certain angles to give you the true benefit of the picture. If the viewer is much higher then the height of the TV the picture will look very bright and washed out. If the viewer is below the height of the TV the picture can look very dark. A "tiltable" base would have helped to remedy this issue. This again can be remedied by buying a wall mount.The major complaint I have with this TV is the very poor contrast ratio that it has in dark indoor scenes as well as outdoor night scenes. Programs such as "CSI" which feature a lot of dimly lit indoor scenes are brutally dark. Blacks and Reds look inky with low contrast.I spent a lot of time calibrating and recalibrating the picture options. I read up a lot on how to do this and although I finally improved somewhat on the picture it still is darker then what it should be.Another important issue which I don't think anyone has mentioned. This is an energy saving unit...and although that is good for your electric bill it is not so great for your picture. Most LCD TVS have something known as either "AUTO DIM" or "DCR (dynamic contrast ratio)". What that does is automatically dim and brighten your backlighting as the LCD deems necessary. This annoying dimming and brightening is most active during well lit sporting events (such as a baseball game). Larger more expensive sets have a menu option to disable this. You cannot disable it on this set.If I had too do it over again I would not buy this set. On the other hand I am not that unhappy where I would return it. For it's price it is OK.For those interested the following are what I found to be the best calibrations for this TV (in TV viewing mode). Please note you MUST set individual calibration settings for EACH input (dvd, pc, etc.)Brightness: 40Contrast:30-35Sharpness: 30Tint: 5Color:13-15 (personal preference..but anything higher seems "cartoonish"Temperature: Cool (personal preference)Backlight: 8 (the higher the backlight the more contrast you lose)***DNR (digital noise reduction): OFF...The factory default is "ON". Having the setting "ON" will remove fine detail from your picture.I hope this helps someone.

Reviews.Title: Great 19" TV
Reviews.Author: Megan Scarlett "megs"
Reviews.Content: I bought this 19" TV to replace an older CRTV I had in my guest bedroom and so far I have been very happy with my purchase. The remote is pretty simple/basic but it gets the job done. The sound and picture quality are good and I like the overall appearance of the TV. I would recommend this TV to others. So, if you are looking for a good deal on a small LCD TV then I would recommend you look at buying this TV.

Reviews.Title: Sharp 19 HDTV
Reviews.Author: M. LOONEY
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV less than a day and I consider this my best purchase from Amazon.  It took me a total of 15 minutes to have the base attached, cable hooked up, and programed. I had looked at RCA, LG, Vizio, Samsung and several others and I am very happy with my choice.  I have a small apartment and my TV sets on a rolling tv cart so I can move it back when I am thru watching it. So, I was impressed with the large base and stability.  The TV I had before was a Coby 15 inch, and while that is a good TV, it can't compare to this one.  I would suggest adding speakers to your purchase.  I had ordered Altec Lansing speakers from Amazon before and they work perfect with this TV.  The speakers hook into the headphones jack on the back of the tv and you still have a headphone jack on the speakers.  The appearance of the tv is great and the size is just right.  I had looked at 19, 22, 24, and even 26.  I am sure glad I choose this size.

Reviews.Title: Good For Compact Spaces
Reviews.Author: J H Murphy "Hank Murphy"
Reviews.Content: My father was recently hospitalized and is now spending much more time in bed than before.  Moving the large TV into his bedroom was not an option, so I purchased this from a local retailer.  The following notes are after a couple of days usage.Pros: this is a very compact unit and is not too heavy.  It fits on a hospital bed table (like this one: Hospital Overbed/Over Bed Top Table Computer Tray ).  This allows his caregivers to move the TV to easy viewing distance and is a real plus.  I was concerned that the unit would be unbalanced, but the weighted base is more stable than I originally imagined.  It seemed like it took a long time to find all the channels on his cable system during the initial setup, although I have not done this often enough with other TVs to judge.  Finally, the basic controls are on the left side of the unit, and the TV can be operated without the remote.Cons: The remote is not designed for use by an older person with declining eyesight.  The controls on the side have no contrasting labels, only labels molded into the black plastic, and unless you have good lighting, it is difficult to use them.  In my fathers case, the caregivers will probably be the only ones who can operate the TV.One additional point, which was a pro for my situation.  The plug is two-prong polarized, which works with my father's very old electrical wiring.  A three-prong plug would have been a problem for me.In our case, I placed the unit near the riser for the over bed table.  This left a lot of space for other things if needed.Recommended for anyone who wants a decent quality, small footprint TV.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Hybrid83
Reviews.Content: Great price, great 19" TV. I looked for the cheapest name brand TV on Amazon and this is what I found. This is exactly what I was looking for. Good picture....good sound....good TV.

Reviews.Title: Great little tv
Reviews.Author: d
Reviews.Content: I purchased this 19" tv for my mother to use in her kitchen under a cabinet. Definitely recommend it. Great picture quality, and the sound really fills the room (huge improvement on the previous television that was flooded out). Very sleek looking casing to the tv as well, very stylish and modern looking.My only complaint for this tv is that the tilt is not adjustable for the stand, so it has to sit straight up and down - and for the particular spot I have it in, this is not a good angle. I just put a pencil under the front of the stand to tilt it back a little bit and it looks fine. Can't even notice th at the pencil is there as the stand covers it well.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the money!
Reviews.Author: J. Jenkins
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for the kitchen to replace a 13" that I had in there that was pretty old.  This is the perfect size for the countertop and is easy to use, works great and has a great picture!  The digital tuner works great with my cable provider and overall I am very pleased with the price and the purchase!  If you are looking for a good buy and a solid product, look no further.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Little TV, Perfect Little Price
Reviews.Author: Mandy Payne "Is it just me?"
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived promptly and was set up in about 10 minutes.  I use it in my bedroom and am very pleased with the portability and quality.  I was afraid that the speakers might not be loud enough, but it is absolutely perfect.

Reviews.Title: Feedback
Reviews.Author: Tom Weaver
Reviews.Content: Delivered in a timely manner and as advertised. This is a nice TV. Took it out of the box and hooked it up with no problems. Picture quality does depend on the quality of the input signal, think about it. I have it hooked up to a good cable signal and the picture is great. Nice selection of inputs. Only complaint is the speaker volume. In a quiet room there wouldn't be a problem. I watch it while riding my Airdyne exercise bike and it needs the aux. speakers I hooked up to it so I can hear it above the ambient noise. Still was a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Great small TV
Reviews.Author: Hi-Tech Geek
Reviews.Content: Arrived today after ordering 2 days ago. Great!Hooked it to the cable and let it set up. The digital tuner is picking up more on the cable than the analogs do.The picture is perfect. No adjustments were necessary.The sound for some maybe an issue as full sound will not drive you out of the room, but for me in my kitchen set up is more than enough.The remote is a little weird with volume being placed above the channel changer instead of left and right. It would not stop me from buying this TV.I am considering buying a second one for my computer room, as it is much better than my monitor picture in a picture.This is an excellent item for the price, and only consumes 28 watts running and less than a watt on standby.It's now mid June and absolutely no other issues. And now the price is dropping below the $167 I paid.

Reviews.Title: Sharp LC19SB27UT 19-Inch
Reviews.Author: M. Chirich
Reviews.Content: The TV is the best in it's class.  The thing I like most about it is that the viewing radius is a lot wider than on most of the 19-26" LCDs.Pros:Great picture qualityGreat colorsWider viewing radius than most TVs in the class (especially from the bottom/top)Easy picture size adjustments (does not automatically force the change)Good sound qualityStandard mounting bracket on the backRemovable baseMost conceivable inputsCons:Low sound volumeNoticeable light fading around screen edgesWeird shaped remote control

Reviews.Title: Somewhat disapointed
Reviews.Author: Frank Joyner
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace another Sharp TV just like it but that one didn't have HD and wasn't digital. This new one is lacking suffcient sound in the digital channels only, and I can't get some of the digital channels that I can get on a 37 inch Sharp Digital HD TV I have. Maybe it's the tuner. I have owned other Sharp products in the past and they were always very reliable. Even though this TV meets my basic needs, I'm a little disapointed in this product.

Reviews.Title: Affordable LCD TV
Reviews.Author: InternetMom13
Reviews.Content: I wanted a affordably priced LCD television for the bedroom to replace a bulky CRT I'd used for many years. And I found one with this Shar tv. It had better reviews than some others I'd looked at and, so far, I have to agree.  The picture is very good and there's plenty of adjustments, so making changes is simple. Being hearing impaired I was surprised at how well I could hear this tv compared to my older one. Set up was simple although the product manual is not very user friendly...confusing and unclear in spots but the average person should have no problems figuring things out on their own. The remote isn't ideal but it's adequate.  It takes some "playing around" to figure out what certain buttons are for and how/when to use them. This is not a television for a large room but works great in a medium or small bedroom, etc. If you're looking for a LCD television that won't cost a bundle, this is a wise choice.

Reviews.Title: A Happy Purchase
Reviews.Author: Carol Bergen
Reviews.Content: It was easy to order and I was very happy with the packaging and the ease of putting the TV together.I would order again through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Amazing HDTV/ Monitor
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV so that it can be veiwed in my small bedroom. Since I don't have a lot of space the PC input is and added plus.-Picture quality - really amazing for such a small inexpensive TV. I don't have a cable box for this TV... just plugged it into the 'analog' RF cable that comes into my house. Once programmed the built-in cable tuner picked up 6 full HD channels as well as 80 or so analog std def. The analog 480i signals look ok, even in stretch mode. The full HD chanels (1080i and 720p) are extremely crisp and clear. My main concern was about pixialtion while watching sports. None of that at all. Smooth action all the way as if you were right there. LCDs really have come a long way.-PC connection - I initially used an analog VGA cable. I had to play with some settings in Windows 7 and adjust the TV a bit. The EDID information was not broadcast to my new Dell computer. Windows 7 only saw this as a generic PnP monitor so getting the correct resolution was a small challenge. (Needed to 'unhide' some resolution choices in hardware manager). Picture was perfect nonetheless. I then ordered an HDMI cable. Picture is the same quality but the computer actually recognizes this as a Sharp TV and now gives full list of resolutions. In addition you can also push your computer audio output through the TV if you want.-Minor complaints - The manual is not clear but it does give you 4 favorite channels on the remote. Cool feature but the manual is worded almost like you can have 4 per button or 16 of them. Not a big deal. - There is one audio output on here and it's just a 1/4in headphone jack. I plugged my computer speakers in the jack but there is a noticiable hiss at low volumes. Same goes for the headphones I tried. It's too bad b/c the audio that comes from the on board speakers is OK at best. Good enough though I suppose for a compact TV.Botton line - If you want a small HDTV with an awesome picture, buy this. Don't expect much from the speakers and use an HDMI cable if you intend to hookup to your PC. Keep in mind that there is only ONE HDMI input.**** TIP: Here's the link for the 6' HDMI cable I purchased -  very inexpensive w/ shipping and works perfectly****[...]

Reviews.Title: Great little video gaming TV
Reviews.Author: Etude
Reviews.Content: This 19" badboy is the perfect hi-def TV set for gamers on a budget. You get an HDMI cable slot, composite cable slots, an S-Video port, and regular AV cable slots for all your gaming needs, all of which work greatly, without a hitch.The picture, too, is of the highest quality. The set may be small, but it makes up for its size in color quality, image clarity, easy transport (the thing weighs less than a bag of cat litter), and your overall bang-for-buck, seeing as it costs less than TV sets several inches smaller. And it's a Sharp, one of the best and most reliable names out there. And I haven't even mentioned the top-class remote control that comes with it. Well, now I have. Moving on.The one- and only- downside to this TV is its speaker setup. Specifically, they're in the very BACK. Those of you who have to put your set right up against the wall will be unhappy with this, but those of us who have it a couple feet from away from the wall or have it hooked up to a sound system will be fine with it.An excellent TV, a wonderful product, and a steal at the current price. Video gamer or not, buy it-- you won't be sorry!

Reviews.Author: thegraylance
Reviews.Content: I was going to purchase this television through Amazon, however, over a 24 hour it went up near $40 dollars, plus the shipping...it was in my 'cart' and wanted to check some measurements before purchased - what 24 hours can change!I decided, after the great reviews, to search this one out and ended up purchasing through another website for $129.99 and $15 dollars for shipping.  A great deal compared to what was offered here.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Sandra L. Knaak "sknaak24"
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews on this TV and others then decided to spend a little more on a brand name I was familiar with. Yes, some say it takes a short time to actually turn on (it does) but for the HD picture and sound I don't mind a bit. Set up was a breeze and then the TV took care of the rest! It sits in the corner of my kitchen very nicely and I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great little extra TV
Reviews.Author: Dottie String
Reviews.Content: I'm using this TV in my office so didn't need much ... but I got a lot more than I expected.  Although the size and slight "tinniness" to the sound stops this from being a primary and only TV, it's absolutely perfect for an office, kitchen, or other "backup" TV in the house.  I'm loving it!

Reviews.Title: Quality 1...
Reviews.Author: Richard E. Cuneo
Reviews.Content: I bought this item to replace my regular TV monitor I use in my karaoke system.  It is absolutely a great addition to my system.  The picture is so crisp and bright.  I've gotten so many positive comments about how clear the screen is.  I'd recommend it to anyone...

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price
Reviews.Author: A. Stahl
Reviews.Content: Nice tv for the money overall.  Its light and has a sharp picture.  It takes some playing around to figure out what certain buttons are for and how/when to use them. This is not a television for a large room but works great in a medium or small bedroom, etc. If you're looking for a LCD television that won't cost a bundle, this is a wise choice. I wanted a affordably priced LCD television for the bedroom to replace a bulky CRT I'd used for many years. And I found one with this Shar tv. It had better reviews than some others I'd looked at and, so far, I have to agree. The picture is very good and there's plenty of adjustments, so making changes is simple. Being hearing impaired I was surprised at how well I could hear this tv compared to my older one. Set up was simple although the product manual is not very user friendly...confusing and unclear in spots but the average person should have no problems figuring things out on their own. The remote isn't ideal but it's adequate.

Reviews.Title: For the price, it's hard to beat this TV
Reviews.Author: J. A. Dierschke "Joyce Dierschke"
Reviews.Content: I read some not-so-good reviews here about this TV, but the price was so good I decided to buy it anyway. I think it is a great TV. The picture is not the best I've seen, but it is world's better than my old TV - same with the sound quality. Overall, a good value in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Another excellent Sharp product
Reviews.Author: Philip C. Chinn
Reviews.Content: The Sharp 19 inch TV was purchased for the guest room to replace older analog with cable box.  This inexpensive Sharp with the Terk indoor antennaTerk HDTVa Indoor Amplified High-Definition Antenna for Off-Air HDTV Reception[[ASIN:B0007MXZB2 Terk HDTVa Indoor Amplified High-Definition Antenna for Off-Air HDTV Receptionit produced an excellent HD picture on all of the channels.  Perfect for its intended use.

Reviews.Title: Great 19" TV!!
Reviews.Author: S. Dill "CincySteve"
Reviews.Content: This a great TV and value.  I was really amazed at the picture quality being skeptical because of the price.  But I am no longer skeptical.  Setup was a breeze seamlessly pairing it was a Level Mount DC30T Tilt Wall Mount for 10" to 30" Displays (Black).  Very easy install and hassle free, after obtaining a drill strong enough to drill through a stud HA.Some reviewers have complained about the sound but I believe it is quite good for the size of the TV.  It isn't going to be THX movie quality but it is what you expect for such a small unit.My only complaint (and it is a small one) is that the tuner is a little slow.  Flipping channels to find something on TV can be a little frusterating because there is a about a second delay between the channel flip and the picture coming up.  Like I said, just a small personal annoyance.  But other than that a great buy!!Pros---------Great Picture and Viewing AngleGood SoundEasy SetupGreat Remote and menusCons--------Tuner a little slow in switching channels

Reviews.Title: Look No Further..
Reviews.Author: Hawaiian Eye
Reviews.Content: I needed a small flat panel tv for bedroom.I read the reviews, and Yes, this is very nice!It picks up HD channels straight off of our plain cheepo cable, with no box!But, that's not saying you will! Just that it has that capability, if your cable companydoesn't block All the HD channels!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Content: This TV is in my kitchen. I researched many 19 inch TV's with better ratings before purchasing this one. However, they were substantially more expensive. It's great for my use in the kitchen. The sound is not very loud but it's certainly adequate. It's mounted in a corner under a cabinet and I haven't noticed any degradation of picture based on viewing angle. It's connected to fiber optics and HD service so I don't use the included remote. We have two other flat panels in the household - a Panasonic plasma and a Vizio LCD, both 1080i. The Sharp picture doesn't compare to either of those; I wouldn't expect it to considering it's price but it's certainly not bad. Overall, I'm very pleased with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Sharp TVs are the way to go, my third one
Reviews.Author: M. rogers
Reviews.Content: I replaced an old tube style TV in my bedroom with this tiny gem. First off, it looks so tiny, however, it was just the adjustment from a huge box, with the same screen, to a tiny panel, with the same size screen. The TV is very bright and looks awesome. I hooked it up to an upscaling DVD player and it looks amazing. The TV weighs about as much as a loaf of bread. It is not feature rich, however, that's fine with something this size. The base screws on easily. Had it up and running in about 5 minutes flat. The picture is very clean and crisp. No issues at all. Sound seems more than adequate. I don't know how much sound output you need for a TV that will be in an office or bedroom, anyway. Very pleased with this little TV. This is the third Sharp brand TV I've bought, and once again, very impressed. It's not all the bells and whistles, but it certainly does more than adequate.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: linda roeske
Reviews.Content: I originally purchased this tv for my bedroom... It was a little small for that room.  I did however use it in my kitchen... Great little tv. Great sound and picture and small enough to move outside or wherever to what your favorite show.I do not have cable and get Hi def picture on the local stations here in Mpls.I may purchase another for my bar area in the lower level..

Reviews.Title: Clear picture, great-looking TV
Reviews.Author: Ryan Holliday
Reviews.Content: This Sharp 19" LCD TV is a welcome addition to my small cabin while working aboard a cruise ship.  I use the TV every day and the only complaints I have so far are minor: one is that if the TV is higher than the viewer, the picture brightness drops a bit.  The other is that there appears to be a built-in dynamic contrast system and it is not very slow to respond to picture changes.  Often while I am watching a program with both bright and dark scenes, there is a very noticeable fade up and down of the brightness as the dynamic contrast ratio is adjusted.  I would like to be able to disable this feature, but unfortunately that appears to be impossible.The build and picture quality are otherwise superb, as I have come to expect from Sharp LCDs TVs.  Audio quality is about the same as any other LCD TV, nothing amazing.I wish the stand was installed by some form of clip-on system rather than via screws, as this would increase portability which is important to me.  However, personally I always have my leatherman multi-tool handy to tackle small jobs like this.

Reviews.Title: Decent TV, but not up to my standards
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to upgrade to an LCD in my bedroom. I wanted something a bit more svelt and a reliable brand. While it's a little smaller than I expected (my fault, that's not reflected in the rating), I have two main concerns which knocked this back to 3 stars.First, vertical angle makes quite a difference on this TV. As you move higher it gets lighter--lower and it gets darker. I find I have to set it quite bright so that, while lying down, it's not too dark. Even sitting up you notice the difference. I expect no significant change in picture quality with any angle these days, and my [much older] Samsungs deliver that.Second, usability. The menus aren't the most efficient, and take more keystrokes than other systems.Additionally, auto-channel search takes forever (though that may be the way it works with the digital stations).Lastly, the volume range isn't that great... doesn't seem to get very loud.Unfortunately, this Sharp has fallen well short of the bar that Samsung set with my primary LCD (32") and computer monitor (17"). Next time I'll stick with Samsung.

Reviews.Title: So disappointed
Reviews.Author: F. Propheter "Reagan Jr."
Reviews.Content: Am I ever sorry I bought this tv. After remodeling our kitchen for several months (I bought the tv but never used it)I finally installed it and mounted it on the wall. All was good.Being a kitchen tv, it never gets used for more than an hour or so at a time.Well, we love hanging out in our new kitchen and the tv gets more use. The problem is, if the tv is on more than 90 minutes or so a black rectangle appears on the screen taking up 50% of the screen space.Turn the tv off and the rectangle disappears, for about 5 minutes or less.Truly a pain in the butt. I would not reccomend this waste of money to anyone!

Reviews.Title: annoying adaptive brightness
Reviews.Author: Review Not
Reviews.Content: If you watch a video source that excites the adaptive brightness control on this tv (you can't turn it off) it will drive you crazy. Picture was great, other than that. But if you are critical of video quality, pick a different tv.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: EB
Reviews.Content: The small viewing angle is a major problem as it limits where TV is placed relative to viewer.Maximum audio volume is limited due probably to underpowered speakers.Display stays fixed in one vertical position. There's no tilt adjustment.Video image (Picture) must be constantly adjusted especially when switching from channel to channel on cable.Nice thing about this unit is that it is easily moved around - Just like any 19" flat panel TVI regret having puchased this product.EB

Reviews.Title: Great TV and Picture--Lousy Sound
Reviews.Author: M. M. Joyce "MMJ"
Reviews.Content: After reading all the reviews, I also chose this TV to use in a small bedroom.  I had never, ever set up a TV before, but this was very simple and I was able to get it up and running--and hooked up to my existing cable service.  I wanted this for an elderly relative who has a bit of failing vision and hearing loss after a series of strokes.  The picture is wonderful, but even on the loudest volume setting, it is difficult to hear.  I believe that one reviewer said he had to get some extra speakers and solved the problem that way.  I am also going to do that. However, in the future, I will be sure to get a TV that has a great picture, but also good sound--they have to go together!  All in all, though, I am happy with the TV and feel it would be great to use just for watching DVDs . . . if one were right up next to it to be able to hear them.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Alice
Reviews.Content: I had high hopes for this t.v. based upon the reviews.  Set up was easy, the picture was great, but the volume did not crank up loudly enough for this hearing impaired senior.  Although with my hearing aids I generally have to crank up only to the mid-volume range on my other t.v.'s (including on my 20 year old G.E.), cranking this to the full volume setting still had me struggling.  This will probably be a fine t.v. for young ears - but we seniors would best stick with something else.

Reviews.Title: Great little tv  for the kitchen or guest room
Reviews.Author: Kimmy in Valencia
Reviews.Content: Our kitchen tv died so we decided to replace it with this one mainly because the price was right (cheaper than the Costco brand, walmart... etc)My only complaint is that the tv is on the stand permanently... so it doesn't tilt or swivel.  The swivel is not that big of a deal since it's easy to move the tv but we find that a small tilt would have been extremely helpful because the likelihood of putting it at an optimal eyelevel is slim.  But because the tv is so light... we ended up putting it on a small stand (the scrolled metal portion of a cat bowl feeder, the kind where you drop 2 stainless steel bowls into it)... and placed a pen horizontally at the front of the base so it gives a slight tilt up.Overall, can't beat the price!!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect Porch TV
Reviews.Author: James B. Howard
Reviews.Content: We purchased this tv after reading the prior reviews which were all good .. tv arrived in perfect condition .. had it hooked up to our cable network; picture is great, size is perfect, color is perfect, sound is perfect .. we wanted a nice small tv for our summer home on the front porch and this is just ideal .. could not be happier and would highly recommended to others

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: amytee
Reviews.Content: I reviewed a LOT of LCD TVs before selecting this one. I chose this one over other 19" TVs with extra features like a built in DVD player or Ipod dock because Sharp is very good brand and a lot of these new brands coming into the market are notorious for breaking down prematurely. And you can't find a Sharp 19" LCD HDTV like this anywhere else for this price. I was a bit wary ordering a TV online, but Amazon has proved once again that it can ship anything well and securely. And once I attached the TV to the stand, it took only about 10 minutes to set the TV up to my cable and begin enjoying it.The only other thing I'd note is that the TV stand is NOT adjustable as I'd assume it would be. However, the default angle its set at ends up being great and it only darkens slightly when viewed off to the side or from underneath (as I was doing situps!). The picture is just really good on this and you can make the screen pretty much as bright as you want. Overall, a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Very good value
Reviews.Author: Kevin M. Shea "Freemarket"
Reviews.Content: Good little TV. Set up on cable or antenna was quick and easy. Sound is tinny but not out of place for a box so small. The only downside is the thickness. Not anywhere near as thin as the Samsung or others. But for the money, this is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Formula 1 on Sharp
Reviews.Author: Paul Koster
Reviews.Content: I bought this Sharp to bring Formula 1 into my den.  It is fed by Time Warner cable through a cable box.  After removing the excellent packaging, making a few simple connections, selecting input 3, and connecting external speakers to the headphone jack, I enjoyed brilliant color, razor sharp images, and more sound than I need.  5 star because delivery was on schedule and after a few days nothing has failed to live up to the Amazon description.

Reviews.Title: Lovin' this Sharp LCD TV!
Reviews.Author: S. Lanning
Reviews.Content: I looked and looked for a TV that I could either mount on the wall or under the cabinet for my breakfast bar in the kitchen.  Many reviews I read for various brands noted poor sound quality, and the models I thought I would like the most were not wall mountable.  I originally was looking for something smaller, but after reading the reviews from internet sites and big box stores, this TV scored very high marks consistently across the board.  With the lowest price and free shipping on Amazon, I decided to go with it.  And I am glad I did!I mounted it on the wall under a cabinet, and it fits just perfectly.  The picture is amazing, and the sound does not seem as if it is coming from inside a tin can, which is often a problem with smaller LCDs.  It has a very nice, clear, and full sound to me.  The volume level at what I think would be a lower volume, is actually quite loud.  When I am standing on the other side of my kitchen, I have no problem hearing or seeing it.  I mounted it on one of those arms that swing out, so I can view it from either side of the kitchen. I have never turned the volume past the midteens. It is that loud.I am very pleased with this TV, and the free shipping was amazingly fast.  I ordered it on a Sunday evening, and it was delivered on Tuesday.  Thanks, Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Buy
Reviews.Author: Southern  grandmother
Reviews.Content: I  was  looking  for a  small  TV  mainly as a  backup to  my  large one  when  it is  unable to pick up  the  satellite dish  signal, especially  during  dangerous  weather.  I  got  an inexpensive  antenna  from  Wall  Mart,  attached  it with  no  problem  and  it picks  up  all  the  local  channels  in this  area.I am  very  pleased  with this TV  and  have  had  several positive comments  from  friends  about the  picture  quality.  I  am  a grandmother with  very little  techinal  ability and I  was  amazed at  how  easy this  set  was  to  program.  I  also  like  that  the screen can  also  be  used with  an computer.  I  would  recomend this  Sharp  TV  and  am  very  pleased  with my purchase.  I  went  to  several  local stores and  could not  find  anything of  comparable  value or  quality.  Thanks  Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: Great deal on a great TV!
Reviews.Author: April
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. Very easy to set-up.  I did A LOT of comparison shopping between sites online and products in the stores.  This was by far the best deal! You won't be disappointed by this TV.

Reviews.Title: Looks and sounds great
Reviews.Author: DHS
Reviews.Content: I placed this order on behalf of my 92 year old hearing impaired mother. Following order placement and before delivery I WEB searched reviews and became concerned that the speakers would not be loud enough. Pleased to report this suggestion is not a problem in our experience. Mum sits close to the set and listens comfortably with volume to spare.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: G. E. Clark
Reviews.Content: All was great. Set up was easy, picture is wonderful. Sound is a bit week but considering the size it's OK. Great for the money.

Reviews.Title: TV-Computer Monitor
Reviews.Author: Tom B
Reviews.Content: I bought this 720p TV/Monitor so that my wife can watch Asian videos downloaded from the Internet on a larger screen than her mini-laptop screen. She loves it! It did not cost any more than a non-TV monitor would have cost. Great picture. Newer computers often have an HDMI connector for use with a TV, but hers does not. So, be sure to get a cable that transfers the voice as well as the picture. I got the "Cables Unlimited PCM-2240-15 SVGA Cable With 3.5mm Male to Male Audio (15 Feet, Black)" which does the job perfectly at a low price.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: D. Guckian
Reviews.Content: With only 1 month of use, this TV is exactly as described and what I wanted. I am very happy with the purchase. Good picture, good sound. The only issue I have with it is the info button shows only the current program. My other TV's show the current program and what's coming up in the next time slot.You certainly can not go wrong for the money!

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for what I wanted
Reviews.Author: James Bennett "Second star to the right, and ...
Reviews.Content: I just got this TV in the mail yesterday afternoon, and I wanted to try it out right away to make sure it worked ok. This is first TV I have bought mail order. Everything seemed to work ok, and I didn't even have to read the owner's manual to set it up. It was very easy to use, and all of the ports worked great. I can't wait to see if I will be able to pick up local channels when we are camping. I bought this TV to use in my camper, and what will be our family play room downstairs (I am still working on it). Since camping season has begun, I have already set it up in the camper, and my son and I will be having our first campout here very soon. I'm glad I was able to find a good TV, because I had read over a lot reviews before I choose this one. Price, ease of use, portability, size, and the types of reviews is how I came to pick this TV. And thanks to Amazon for getting it to me so quickly.

Reviews.Title: Bad picture, remote worked AT TIMES!
Reviews.Author: Edward S. "Oldtech"
Reviews.Content: I gave this thing a shot because the reviews weren't as bad as those for most of the small lcd Tvs out there. I would have perhaps even put up with the inconsistent and fuzzy images (as I have it near my PC and mostly only 'listen' to the TV), but the TV only responded to the remote intermittently (same with my satellite remote programmed for the SHARP TV) which I found very odd. You would think it would either work, or not work! I have a SHARP 19sb14u with the "titanium" tilt base I got at Cost*o a few years ago which I like much better. It has a fine picture and nice remote. This unit was very cheaply made with a non-tilting (and shorter) base and a chintzy remote. I gave it 2 stars for the decent sound (a bit better than the 19sb14u) and the super low price. But back to Amazon it goes. I'll look for something else.

Reviews.Title: Excellent small HDTV/Monitor!
Reviews.Author: Greg Alexander "serious gamer"
Reviews.Content: This TV was exactly what I was looking for!  I am using it for my PS3 / Wii and also as a monitor for my laptop, and it works perfectly for all 3!  Be prepared to do a good bit of tweaking of the picture settings, but once you do the image is sharp, clear & vivid.  Colors really "pop".  I read some complaints with the built-in sound, but it sounds fine to me when listening at it at a low to medium volume.  It has a digital output if you want to connect it to external sound.  I only had one very minor complaint, not enough to knock anything off of my rating but worth mentioning - there is no headphone jack on the TV.  Otherwise, I couldn't possibly be more pleased with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Good product good value
Reviews.Author: Over Drive
Reviews.Content: Good overall product especially for the money.  Sound can be a bit low if the room is noisy.  Channels change a bit slowly, but overall we are very happy and would buy this again...especially considering the price.

Reviews.Title: Best deal for the money by far!
Reviews.Author: Dennis P. Williams
Reviews.Content: After looking online and at B&M; stores. I found this set on Amazon. At first I thought it must be a price mistake. After all, Walmart'sB&M; cheapest set at the time was $188.00 + tax. That was for an Emerson 19" LCD. This being a Sharp TV, really made the decision a no brainer. My wife uses this in our bedroom and she loves it. Set-up was a breeze. Simple controls and menus are exactly what she needed.I liked this deal so much. I've decided as I'm writing this review, To purchase another one for my 10 year old daughter.

Reviews.Title: totally frustrated
Reviews.Author: C. Fazio
Reviews.Content: Sharp had always been a reliable choice - not this time.  When the set arrived, one channel was fuzzy and had no sound. We determined that it was definitely the set, not our cable. Sharp technician was not able to help at all and said I had to return the set to them directly at my expense to have it repaired (2-3 weeks).  That made no sense for a brand new product.  Amazon was EXCELLENT in its customer service.  The rep immediately provided a pre-paid return label and also sent a new TV.  Same problem. Same frustration.  Returned the set and purchased a Vizeo instead.

Reviews.Title: Meets expectations
Reviews.Author: DFS
Reviews.Content: We needed a new TV to replace the old tube in our kitchen, which also happened to be a Sharp. High performance was not a requirement since it was not going to be connected to an HD cable box. It is connected to cable from the wall through a Comcast digital adapter. I wish we could get HD directly from the wire already!Location is the top of our refrigerator which caused a problem. The TV does not tilt up or down and the viewing angle up and down is terrible. So much so that I had to buy a ceiling mount for it. With the ceiling mount in place I can tilt it down so the viewing is just fine. I really didn't feel like returning the TV and finding another one. Even if I did the tilt probably wouldn't have been low enough.I purchased a small amplified HD antenna and A/B switch and I do get a few HD channels but the signals are not strong. I currently don't know if it's the antenna or the tuner in the TV. I have a high performance 52" Sony HDTV in the family room that gets strong signals with a non-amplified antenna. I used that antenna on this TV and got nothing. I'm leaning towards thinking the Sharp tuner is not so good but I'll have to keep testing.Standard Def viewing is OK in stretch mode. We mostly watch the news or the ballgame during dinner, or maybe the kids watch cartoons or my wife watches cooking shows. It's sort of there for background listening.All in all I'm happy with this TV as it met my expectations for the price.

Reviews.Title: Red Line
Reviews.Author: ElizabethC
Reviews.Content: The T.V. was great for a few weeks. Until a red line started showing up down the middle of the screen. Sending it back to where we purchased it for a full refund. Very dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: Sharp tv
Reviews.Author: Kelli Fletcher "teacher lady"
Reviews.Content: Great tv.  Good product. Great value. Only small complaint, when in picture box mode...the bottom 1/8 inch of picture shows on top of screen.

Reviews.Title: Sharp TV Purchase Review
Reviews.Author: V. Veritas "Vajra Yana"
Reviews.Content: TV screen size is doable, packaged properly for shipment and received quickly.The on-line details should include the fact that the audio/video cables ARE NOT included.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Ruth Anderson
Reviews.Content: This TV/monitor hasa great picture and I love the fact that servesa dual purpose as a computer monitor. It connects easily to my desk tower.

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Desert Flower
Reviews.Content: Good picture quality and sound. Easy to set up.  Great for a den or small guest room. Quality product that will last.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Darryl C. Nicholas "ColorBAT"
Reviews.Content: I use it in my bedroom. Picture quality and channel-changing is great. The volume control seels a little non-responsive. But, for bedroon use it's OK.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Jo Anne "travel bug"
Reviews.Content: We've had this TV in our kitchen for more than a year. The picture is clear, sound is good, and it responds quickly when using the remote. We're very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Lasted almost 3 years
Reviews.Author: TechGuy "Jack"
Reviews.Content: Good picture for almost 3 years. It still works but the color is bad, all red and blue, no real green or yellow anymore. Bought Feb. 2010. Color screwed up September 2012.

Reviews.Title: A handy small TV
Reviews.Author: S. Wallace
Reviews.Content: I use this TV all over the house.  I can pick it up and take it to another room to watch TV where I'm working.  I take it out to the travel trailer to watch TV in peace and quiet.  I even use it at my computer in place of my monitor if I want to watch a movie rental online.  Convenient with a stunning low price tag.  Fabulous picture and easy to use.  It doesn't have a lot of volume so I've attached speakers with a sub-woofer and now I can hear everything I want to hear.  Now it's perfect.

Reviews.Title: One of many
Reviews.Author: Old Man Walking
Reviews.Content: One of the four TV's we have in our living room (see my Vaio review with the same title).  Thsy all work fine.

Reviews.Title: Small LCD TV
Reviews.Author: K. McW "Stuff"
Reviews.Content: A fine product overall.The screen is a little dark and had to be adjusted brighter.Used in our kitchen so picture quality was not as important as price.

Reviews.Title: Good value tv
Reviews.Author: lynnie81
Reviews.Content: Good value, looks brand new.  Great gift for anyone, works great.  All manuals & remote control were included.  Would have never known it was refurbished.

Reviews.Title: Sharp LC19SB27UT 19-Inch 720p LCD HDTV, Black
Reviews.Author: Uncle Sam "easygoing"
Reviews.Content: I bought this from Amazon Subsidiary. It is a used product, but works very well. Very light and portable. I use it without the HD receiver, but nonetheless the picture quality is very good.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV and a price that can't be beat!
Reviews.Author: E. Riley
Reviews.Content: Our home was struck by lightning twice this summer, and along with many other electronic items in our home, the TV in our bedroom did not survive. We bought this TV as the replacement, and we couldn't be more pleased! The picture is sharp (no pun intended) and the sound is great. It turned out to be a better TV than we expected, and the best part is, the price is more than reasonable! You will not be disappointed with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great product for its price
Reviews.Author: Raul B
Reviews.Content: This TV is an easy setup for my multi media player.  Except for not automatically detecting the input source (which is really not a big deal), I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: verysharpSharp
Reviews.Author: tmike
Reviews.Content: Perfect size and picture for our screened in summer porch.Light weight,easily connected,easily moved,and simple to connect and use.

Reviews.Title: Great Sharp LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: This 15" LCD is a tremendous value. The price was outstandng for a name brand. Great picture and very easy to set-up and use. Highly recommended for a kitchen or spare bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the kitchen
Reviews.Author: E. Barton "happy2quilt"
Reviews.Content: My husband and I wanted a tv for the kitchen which would fit in a small space.  We did a lot of price comparison between the box stores and read reviews on-line.  Based on comments from others who had purchased this item, we decided to give it a try.  We couldn't be happier.  The TV arrived within days and set up in minutes.  Although the sound is lower on some channels than others, that's okay because it is in a small space and the volume isn't an issue.  It would also be perfect for a bedroom or any other space that someone was looking for small.  The picture is very clear and sharp. We would definitely purchase this item again.

Reviews.Title: Sharp LC19SB27UT 19-inch purchase
Reviews.Author: deloris timmons
Reviews.Content: The television was easy to put together and the picutre is quite good.  The sound system is less than desirable.  I had to install external speakers in order to get a decent volume.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Peggy
Reviews.Content: We were pleasantly surprised with our purchase. It's a great TV and has great picture and sound quality. We have it in our kitchen which is the usual gathering area for family and friends. It was well packed and offered automatic set up which was really helpful.It's a great Buy!

Reviews.Title: what do you want for 150$
Reviews.Author: RD
Reviews.Content: A little under gunned on the audio - necessary to turn it up quite a ways when on the treadmill (which is fairly quiet).  By the time we decided to add the TV to the room we were budgeting pretty hard so we chose the least expensive unit and hoped it would suffice - it does but hindsight tells me that I would pony up the additional 40 or 50 next time and purchase a different unit.  Amazon was a breeze to deal with as always.

Reviews.Title: Sharp 19 inch
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: The price was great. The shipping went well and I am very happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: PFPNY
Reviews.Content: It would be nice if this had an adjustable base so I could tilt it since I have it up a bit high and the image appears much darker when looking up at the screen from even a slight angle.Also, it seems like the audio quality dropped a bit after the first week because I suddenly had to turn the volume up much higher than I did when I first got it to hear it as well and it doesn't seem to get much louder once you pass the half point on the volume bar.Both could just be my ears though. Beyond that, this was a fantastic television for the price and the image quality is great!

Reviews.Title: Fine small TV
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I wanted a small set to use in my study which is a small room.  This fit the bill.Works fine and didn't cost too much.

Reviews.Title: Good for Watching Silent Movies Only
Reviews.Author: Frank Conner "author, "The South Under Si...
Reviews.Content: I can barely hear the audio on my new Sharp 19" LCD HDTV with the volume cranked up all the way, and with no distracting noises in the room.  I had owned several Sharp TVs in the past, and until now I considered them to be good-quality no-frills TV sets.  No more.

Reviews.Title: Sharp LCD 19-inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Amazon shopper 'Gladiola'
Reviews.Content: I like this tv very much. It is just what I wanted for my kitchen.The reviews from other customers were very helpful to me. Setting it up took very little time. Great value!

Reviews.Title: Clear Images and true color
Reviews.Author: Mary Spangler
Reviews.Content: You can not go wrong with this tv. The picture is very clean and crisp. No issues at all. Sound seems more than adequate. I don't know how much sound output you need for a TV that will be in an office or bedroom, anyway. Very pleased with this little TV. This is the third Sharp brand TV I've bought, and once again, very impressed. It's not all the bells and whistles, but it certainly does more than adequate. I replaced an old tube style TV in my bedroom with this tiny gem. First off, it looks so tiny, however, it was just the adjustment from a huge box, with the same screen, to a tiny panel, with the same size screen. The TV is very bright and looks awesome. I hooked it up to an upscaling DVD player and it looks amazing. The TV weighs about as much as a loaf of bread. It is not feature rich, however, that's fine with something this size. The base screws on easily. Had it up and running in about 10 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Amazon. com Provides Great Little TV for a Reasonable Price
Reviews.Author: D. Nieveen
Reviews.Content: We had a 15 inch TV in our kitchen, but it was bulky and took up a lot of room on the counter even though it was small.  This Sharp 19 inch is streamlined and fits well along the back of our countertop.  There is a little lag when you change channels but I was expecting this from reading other reviews pretaining to this TV.  It does not appear to be a problem.  The clarity of picture is good as well as the sound.  My grandkids enjoy sitting at the breakfast bar watching this TV.  We also plan on putting this Sharp TV in our travel trailer when we travel over a period of time.  It is compact and the portability will make it convenient to take along on vacation.  We are well pleased with this product and would recommend it to anyone.  I was a little apprehensive with having it shipped, but it arrived in great conditions and was extremely well packed.  A great little TV for a great price.  Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Tiny and Cute
Reviews.Author: Paulette
Reviews.Content: Good picture and sound, but hard to find some stations.  It works well in my guest room.

Reviews.Title: Solid TV
Reviews.Author: ccamer79NJ
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my home office. Looks great. Sound is as I expected, no great shakes. Easy to set up and for the price, a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: TV review
Reviews.Author: M. R. Stepanian
Reviews.Content: This is our 2nd sharp small screen TV. We use it mainly in the kitchen. We gave our other sharp to our daughter as she needed a small TV.  Apparently 19" is the smallest flat screen available. Our other Sharp TV was 15" and about 4 years old.  We never had any problems with our first Sharp and were happy satisfied so we bought another SharpWe are happy with the quality although the sound system could use a little help. The remote is a bit awkward.  The volume and channel controls are above one another.  Most remotes have them side by side.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: C. DeWald "Ashnrysaunt"
Reviews.Content: My husband purchased this TV for me for my birthday. We have a gazebo in our back yard that we spend a lot of time in during the summer. I didn't want to miss all the new summer shows so he made the necessary changes with the cable to watch TV in the gazebo. I LOVE IT! It's the perfect size, the picture is very clear, and its easy to use. My only complaint is the sound, I'm looking into purchasing speakers because its a little difficult to hear outside at times. Overall, I'm pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Good little TV!
Reviews.Author: Gloria Doan
Reviews.Content: I was surprised at how easily I could get this one working. Manual instructions were a little confusing but I could figure it out for myself. Color is not all that great but is acceptable.I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Good choice; just one slight fault
Reviews.Author: VT Sooner
Reviews.Content: This TV was just as advertised. The only minor "glitch" was that when it is used with a wall mount, it shows the aluminum mounting protrusion used when the base mount is utilized. I emailed Sharp, and was advised not to remove the back of the TV to take it off. I think Sharp might have engineered a better removable bracket as opposed to what is offered presently when a wall mount is used. As I've written here, just a minor thing, but it's always there...

Reviews.Title: 19 inch Sharp LCD HDTV Black
Reviews.Author: Marisa
Reviews.Content: I purchased this T.V. for my 19-year-old son's room; I was finally able to get rid of his bulky T.V. he had previously.  It is kind of small though his room is pretty small as well.  I think I might get a 24 inch on my next purchase but it suits his room just fine.  I would recommend this product for any small guest room, kitchen or garage.  Picture and sound quality is excellent and the price was great; can't beat it at Amazon :)

Reviews.Title: Thought I ordered a Sony (Silly me)
Reviews.Author: D. LENTZ
Reviews.Content: It is a pretty good tv being I thought I was ordering a Sony,  I asked my husband if it was ok to order this Sony and got a sharp.  Woops-(now he won't let me live it down LOL) He doesn't like the picture-he thinks everything is distorted.  Other than that it is a pretty good tv.

Reviews.Title: A real bargain
Reviews.Author: steven kay
Reviews.Content: Letters along the bottom sometimes get chopped off because of screen size but for $167 this little tv is a steal.

Reviews.Title: Good LCD for thee price!!!
Reviews.Author: Jaime Bolanos V "Millo"
Reviews.Content: This LCD is great for small and it's sound, maybe the menus are a little confuse but the TV in general works fine, the image is good and i pretty happy with the purchase!!

Reviews.Title: Sharp Television Review
Reviews.Author: Twilight Overhiser
Reviews.Content: It's an excellent purchase and I am very pleased with it. There is only one thing that irks me and that is the fact that there is not a power(or any) buttons on the actuial televisioon set itself, so when I loose my remote I am powerless to do anything until i find it...

Reviews.Title: great picture * poor sound
Reviews.Author: Jim B. Tremaine
Reviews.Content: overall a great tv for the bedroom. if used other than a bedroom set you will not be happy with the audio of the tv. There is no provision for external speakers either.Be forewarned great picture poor sound.

Reviews.Title: 19 inch sharp tv
Reviews.Author: Raven Maven "Raven"
Reviews.Content: From inception to completion all 5 star. TV arrived in timely manner, compact packaging, easy hook-up, tv automatic identification of analog/digital signals. Perfect size for my office, in my opinion the black frame surrounding screen helps with picture enhancement. Have purchased Sharp tv prior for son's gift and pleased with performance. Amazon purchase and customer service experience have been and continue to be positive. Will purchase through this venue until this proves inferior to another superior manner of product review, selection, tracking, delivery, post-purchase satisfaction. Kudos to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Sharp 19 inch
Reviews.Author: G-ma
Reviews.Content: Excellent value. Setting up the color took some practice and manipulation, but finally very satisfied. Delivery very quick and excellent packing.  LCD's are not viewable from side angles, and screen is grey rather than black when TV is off, but otherwise it's a great buy.

Reviews.Title: BEST BANG FOR THE BUCK
Reviews.Author: Michael P. Poletti
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the money would have given it 5 stars but picture is a little red and must be adjusted manually and the speakers are a little weak.I can live with that as it is very sharp and clear,and an easy menu.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Small TV
Reviews.Author: E. Anderson
Reviews.Content: This little 19" television is perfect for a small bedroom or other small room.  I hooked it up to my DVR from ATT and get High Definition at 720p.  I'm looking for a larger model for my family room.  Good product.

Reviews.Title: Good value, some downsides
Reviews.Author: Juan C. Thurman
Reviews.Content: Great looking TV, easy to setup and use.  We have it in a bright room (kitchen), the picture looks a little dark and the sound is pretty weak.  Picture is sharp and clear.

Reviews.Title: Best Bang for your Buck for a 19in TV
Reviews.Author: Chris "Chrisco"
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these for my business.  They are nice little tvs that do the job.  The price and quality for this tv is unbeatable.  Unlike many other small tv speakers these don't crack or hiss at high volumes.  This tv is identical to the Sanyo DP19649 and a Polaroid (model?) just different cosmetic casing.

Reviews.Title: sharp hits a home run
Reviews.Author: Mark J. Rini
Reviews.Content: bought it for the bedroom, perfect size, great picture, no problem with the sound great price

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: ScorpioMoon
Reviews.Content: Needed a new tv for my kitchen. Did research & read a lot of reviews; decided on this tv and was very disappointed. No matter what I did, I couldn't get the darkness/brightness right or sharpness or anything else for that matter. Was very frustrated and even had my brother-in-law (who's a electronics tech) try to help me. We couldn't get an even-toned, good, sharp picture (esp when coming through my dvd player). Everything was TOO dark--and ALL the adjustments available did nothing. Unbelievable.. I've had Sharp items before and thought I was getting a good product at a good price but was sorely disappointed. Sent this one back for what I thought looked more user-friendly, easier-to-make-adjustments tv and found it in the LG (also here at amazon-thanks to it's detailed description). What a difference. Had no problems getting a perfect picture from the LG.

Reviews.Title: Sharp 19" TV
Reviews.Author: Philippe Jean Jorat "Carpenter"
Reviews.Content: Works great except for the bottom firing speakers which makes no sense unless your directly under the TV watching it with a mirror.

Reviews.Title: Great quality for the money
Reviews.Author: J. Moore
Reviews.Content: Small enough to sit under kitchen cabs, but picture big enough to be enjoyed within 12-15 feet.  In fact, it's sitting on top of the direct tv box.  Really good picture -- didn't test side viewing because we have it set up angled in corner so that all views are good and has no outside light interference.  I do agree with other complaints that the volume seems low on some programs, but I find that true with my other HDTVs on certain shows, so  I think it must be in the broadcasting or something.  Anyway, great price from Amazon ($167) for this quality.  Shipped within a few days, very lightweight and easy to move around.  Has HDMI port which makes it real easy for set up.

Reviews.Title: There are better products out there for the same  price
Reviews.Author: R C "Sports Photographer"
Reviews.Content: I thought this would be a much better product based upon the reviews. I have seen much better values at Costco lately, including LED displays, built in DVD player and 22" screens.Two things I really don't care for is the lack of a tilt-able screen and the fact it doesn't work right with my computer. I know a lot about computers and this device won't play nice with it. If you are going to offer PC and TV, why not picture in picture?It is thicker than most current offerings. This is a gift and I am sure they will be happy with it, but if you are an audio-video-phile like me, skip it.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it!
Reviews.Author: D. Carlson
Reviews.Content: No matter what you do the picture wouldn't stay.Couldn't bring in channels,had hard time with just the normal channels.The remote is frustating. The sound &channel; button are next to each other,you hit one when you wanted the other,plus if you didn't hit the dot button it wouldn't go to the right channel.At times the on &off; wouldn't work.  Amazon was nice about the returning it.I like Amazon! The tech. said it was in  the tuner.Have to send in to fix.

Reviews.Title: Sharp not so sharp
Reviews.Author: Russ G. Werth "SWNDSAMSUNGSINGER"
Reviews.Content: Words are fuzzy. I guess I expected more but since it is just for the kitchen I won't go thru the hassle of retrurning for the $167. Spend the extra $40 and get a Samsung or LD

ProductInfo.Features:
Sharp's 19-inch HDTV LCD TV slim design with a distinctive small foot print.
Built-in ATSC / QAM / NTSC Tuners for DTV and analog TV viewing
HDMI Input for convenient connection to a digital device
PC Input conveniently turns your TV into a PC monitor
Component Input
ProductInfo.Name: Sharp LC19SB27UT 19-Inch 720p LCD HDTV, Black
